price: الله لومړی پيدايښت کوي، بیا يې دوباره هم كوي، بيا به هغه ته ورګرځولی شئ.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
